location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, communicating the intention of Saad bin Abdel Azeez [Saud bin Abdel Aziz], Agent of the Chieftain of the Wahabees [Wahhabis], to establish a connection with the Company against the Joasimese [Qasimi] tribe and other Chieftains of the Persian Gulf, on the basis of the agreement signed by Captain David Seton, representing the East India Company, and Sheikh Abdulla Ben Croosh [Shaikh Abdullah bin Qasim bin Qurush Āl Qāsimī], representing the Joasimese tribe, on 6 February 1806 (copy attached).
